aspguidp.service.output.condition.impl

Class AtomConditionStatementService

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidp.service.output.condition.impl.AtomConditionStatementService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtomConsumer, ConditionStatementService

    public class AtomConditionStatementService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConditionStatementService, AtomConsumer
    Implementation of the ConditionStatementService interface which manages the status of an atom condition statement.

    An instance of this class is assigned to a condition atom. The instance provides a method to access a observable property, which signals if the condition atom is contained in the currently displayed answer set.

    This class registers itself as atom consumer to the output atom hub and therefore implements the AtomConsumer interface (AtomHub).
